tips.title: üèÜ Winners' Castlist
tips.description: Create a Custom Castlist ordered by Season
tips.showcase:
# ‚ú® CastBot New Features (1/10)
-# v3.0

**üèÜ Winners' Castlist**
Create a Custom Castlist of all of your winners, nicely ordered by the season they won.

**üß© How to setup**
‚Ä¢ If it doesn't already exist, create a Winner Role in your ORG Server and assign it to past winners
‚Ä¢ Create a new castlist from `/menu` > Castlist Manager > ‚ú® Create New Castlist
‚Ä¢  Choose Castlist Sorting Method as Vanity Role (Winners) and give the castlist a name like 'Winners'
‚Ä¢ Under 'Tribes on Castlist' add your Winner Role
‚Ä¢ You (or specs) can then post it from `/menu` (see the buttons up the top next to 'Post Castlist') or from within Castlist Manager
‚Ä¢ To make the winners appear in nice season-chronology-order, go into `/menu` > Players and assign each player a vanity role of the season they won. Castbot will then order alphabetically-then-numerically, so a player who won S1 will appear above a player who won S9.

**üéüÔ∏è Tips**
‚Ä¢ If a player has won multiple seasons, they'll only appear once, ordered by the first alpha-numerically ordered vanity role of the season they won.

tips.title: üéì Alumni Placements
tips.description: Show who placed when in your seasons!
tips.showcase:
# ‚ú® CastBot New Features (2/10)
-# v3.0

**üéì Alumni Placements**
Show who placed where in your past seasons!

**üß© How to setup**
‚Ä¢ If they don't already exist, create a Discord role for your alumni (e.g., "Season 1 Alumni") and assign it to each alumni
‚Ä¢ Create a new castlist from `/menu` > Castlist Manager > ‚ú® Create New Castlist
‚Ä¢ Under 'Associated Season', select the season. If you haven't used Castbot for your Season Apps, you can quickly create this from `/menu` > Apps and then return. This lets you set placements per-season.
‚Ä¢ Under 'Tribes on Castlist' add the Season Role that your players are assigned to
‚Ä¢ Click the Placements button and then click 'Set Place', this will ensure they are displayed in order of placement.

üéüÔ∏è Tips
‚Ä¢ Players without a placement will appear first in the castlist - this is since it assumes the season is ongoing. If there is some reason for not assigning a player a placement, you can give them a dummy low ranking (e.g. 99) to put them at the bottom of the castlist.
